name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Open Souce IG Account Exporter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Instagram followers or following accounts to CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IG Account Exporter is a powerful, free, and open-source Chrome extension that simplifies Instagram lead generation by allowing you to export followers and following lists from any Instagram profile to CSV format. Whether you're a digital marketer, business owner, or social media manager, this tool streamlines your workflow and helps you identify potential customers efficiently.

## Key Features

Export followers and following lists from any Instagram profile
Download data in organized CSV format
Run multiple exports simultaneously across different tabs
Real-time progress monitoring
Simple, user-friendly interface
100% Free and open-source

## Why Choose IG Account Exporter?
✓ Cost-Effective: Unlike expensive subscription-based alternatives, our extension is completely free
✓ Transparent: Open-source code ensures security and reliability
✓ Time-Saving: Export multiple lists simultaneously
✓ User Privacy: No data collection or storage on our servers
✓ Regular Updates: Continuous improvements and maintenance
Perfect For

Digital Marketers
Small Business Owners
Social Media Managers
Content Creators
Market Researchers
Anyone looking to grow their Instagram presence

Transform your Instagram marketing strategy with IG Account Exporter - the free, efficient, and reliable way to generate leads from Instagram. Download now and streamline your social media workflow!
Note: This extension respects Instagram's terms of service and user privacy guidelines. Use responsibly and in accordance with Instagram's policies.
